content:
Meghatthin gambheeraddhvanipol
kaahallanaadam pongumpoll
sheshikkillaadaamyanmaar than
podipolum paathaallatthil
/taadaamyanmaaraashabdam
/tkellkkum maathrayilezhunnelkkum
/t paarkkilanithya shareeramaho
Ennum navajeevan thannil
Nithyathaye praapicheedum.

Svargatthin raajaave! Sthuthithe
Sakala paretha prathyaashe!
Karmmangallkkanusrthamaayoduvil
Sakalarkkum prathiphalamekaan
/tneeyezhunnallllumpoll naathhaa!
/tdushdan thee narakam nedum
/tshishdanmaar svargam nedum
annaallaardrathayaal naathhaa!
Nyangalle valamaayu nirtthenam.
